articles.title: Jim Cramer Thinks Amazon Stock’s a Buy After Doing Nothing All Year. Why He’s Absolutely Right.
articles.content: Mad Money host Jim Cramer doesn’t yet appear ready to give up on shares of Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN), even after lagging most of its peers in the Magnificent Seven basket. Undoubtedly, where others see a slower-growing hyperscaler with AI capabilities that are dragging, others might see an opportunity. After rising just over 5% in the past ...
